pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Tool for Writing Cleaner, more Transparent Code // To create clearer, more concise code provides this toolbox helps coders to isolate the essential parts of a script that produces a chosen result, such as an object, tables and figures written to disk and even warnings and errors. This work was funded by US National Science Foundation grant SSI-1450277 for applications of End-to-End Data Provenance.
